      • score

        public Passage score(java.lang.String name,
            double value)
        Set the value of this Score for this answer, returning the Answer. The intended use is something like this: Answer a = new Answer(.......).score(PassageScore.SKIP_BIGRAM, 9.45).score(PassageScore.SKIP_BIGRAM, -1.2)
        Parameters:
        name -
        value -
